meta.name: description
meta.content: Find the latest classified ads for flats, jobs, cars, motorbikes, furniture, tools, personals and more for sale in India. Find buyers and sellers that suit your need. Advertise for free on Quikr

button.class: mdc-button mdc-ripple-upgraded mdc-ripple-upgraded--unbounded mdc-button--compact mdc-button--dense mdc-button--unelevated mdc-ripple-upgraded--foreground-deactivation

li.p: CategoriesCars, Services, Mobiles, Electronics, Bazaar, Quikr Homes

label.p: Register with us and earn Rs.500 to your QCash account

div.h3:
QCash Zone
Let us put a smile on your face

label.p: They say, happiness grows when shared

a.p: Invite your friends & earn 500 QCash for each referral
Buy Quikr Assured products and get discounts upto ₹5000
Get ₹1000 QCash for installing Quikr app on your phone
Register with us & get exciting discounts & ₹1000 QCash
Posting an Ad will reward you ₹5000 QCash

div.h3: Want better recommendations? Turn on your location & we’ll show ads nearby.

div.p: Create free alert & get updates from Quikr?

button.class: mdc-button mdc-ripple-upgraded mdc-ripple-upgraded--unbounded mdc-button--compact mdc-button--accent mdc-button--dense mdc-button--stroked mdc-ripple-upgraded--foreground-deactivation mdc-button__create
